footer.description: Automation solutions and workflow optimization specialized in web tools

angkasa.name: Angkasa Automation
angkasa.description: Automated download and upload of reports, misalignment identification, and member repayment transaction insertion for streamlined workflows.
angkasa.fullDescription: A robust automation pipeline designed for systemic financial report management. The tool automates the secure retrieval of reports, performs deep-data parsing to identify misalignments between member records and repayment schedules, and executes precise transaction insertions into banking systems. This end-to-end solution eliminates manual data entry errors and ensures 100% data integrity across all reporting cycles.

onesignal-subs-scraper.name: OneSignal Subs Scraper
onesignal-subs-scraper.description: Efficiently scrapes OneSignal subscription data per page to reduce manual monitoring and cognitive load for CRM management.
onesignal-subs-scraper.fullDescription: An intelligent data harvesting tool optimized for high-volume CRM monitoring. It navigates the OneSignal dashboard using advanced scraping techniques to extract subscription metrics across multiple pages. By automating these periodic audits, the system provides real-time visibility into subscriber growth and engagement trends, allowing management to focus on strategy rather than tedious manual tracking.

onesignal-domain-inserter.name: OneSignal Domain Inserter
onesignal-domain-inserter.description: Automated domain insertion tool achieving a 0% error rate compared to manual human processes, significantly increasing reliability.
onesignal-domain-inserter.fullDescription: A specialized automation tool developed to maintain mission-critical domain registries. It handles the batch insertion of domain configurations into OneSignal with perfect precision, bypassing the inherent risks of human manual entry. This tool ensures that notification delivery routes are correctly mapped every time, maintaining a 0% error rate across thousands of operational updates.

stamplist.name: Stamplist
stamplist.description: High-speed automated loan submission system capable of processing hundreds of submissions in minutes, eliminating scalability bottlenecks.
stamplist.fullDescription: A high-velocity loan submission engine built for massive scale. Stamplist automates the entire document submission lifecycle, allowing for hundreds of concurrent loan applications to be processed across multiple lender platforms simultaneously. By eliminating the manual 'one-by-one' submission process, it allows businesses to scale their loan volumes without adding operational headcount.

game-arrangement.name: Game Arrangement
game-arrangement.description: Concurrent automated brand management for game arrangements, reducing processing time.
game-arrangement.fullDescription: An industry-specific brand management tool that orchestrates game arrangements across several global platforms. It utilizes parallel task execution to manage brand configurations, promotional assets, and regulatory compliance checks concurrently. The result is a dramatic 80% reduction in time-to-market for each new brand launch or game update.

payment-gateway-checker.name: Payment Gateway Checker
payment-gateway-checker.description: Continuous automated testing and status verification for multiple payment gateways, reducing operational expenses and manual oversight.
payment-gateway-checker.fullDescription: A mission-critical monitoring system that performs continuous health checks on diverse payment gateway integrations. It simulates transactions and verifies API responses around the clock, instantly alerting technical teams to downtime or processing anomalies. This proactive approach ensures maximum checkout uptime and significantly lowers the need for 24/7 manual monitoring.

vip-file-updater.name: VIP File Updater
vip-file-updater.description: Scalable automation for VIP file updates, replacing manual 30-minute updates with an efficient 5-minute automated process.
vip-file-updater.fullDescription: A precision data synchronization tool tailored for high-priority client management. It automates the complex updating of VIP records across distributed databases, performing strict validation checks at every step. What used to be a tedious 30-minute manual data entry task is now a perfectly executed 5-minute automated cycle, ensuring VIP clients always receive the most up-to-date service tiers.

account-reconcilator.name: Account Reconcilator
account-reconcilator.description: End-to-end automation for retrieving, filtering, and uploading payment gateway documents to Excel for streamlined reconciliation.
account-reconcilator.fullDescription: A sophisticated automated accounting assistant that handles the entire reconciliation workflow. It logs into various payment providers, extracts settlement documents, applies custom filtering logic to isolate discrepancies, and compiles the final data into standardized Excel formats. This tool transforms a complex multi-tool manual process into a single, reliable automated operation.

manual-banking.name: Manual Banking
manual-banking.description: Automated banking transaction processing from download to summary message, reducing manual data entry time.
manual-banking.fullDescription: A transformative banking automation script that handles the end-to-end lifecycle of transaction processing. From logging in and downloading e-statements to parsing transactions and generating automated Telegram/Slack summary notifications for finance teams. It effectively replaces manual data entry agents, allowing for near-instant transaction visibility with 95% less human effort.

predictive-dialer-uploader.name: Predictive Dialer List Uploader
predictive-dialer-uploader.description: Streamlined automated listing uploader for predictive dialers, replacing complex manual preparation and repeat upload cycles.
predictive-dialer-uploader.fullDescription: An optimized data pipeline for call center operations. It automates the preparation and uploading of lead lists into predictive dialer systems. The tool handles CSV parsing, field mapping, and API integration, eliminating the repetitive 'upload-check-fix' cycles that typically stall sales operations, and ensuring that dialing agents always have fresh, clean data to work with.

broadcast-dialer-uploader.name: Broadcast Dialer List Uploader
broadcast-dialer-uploader.description: Efficient automated broadcast dialer uploader that handles multiple listings concurrently, solving repetitive workflow constraints.
broadcast-dialer-uploader.fullDescription: A high-performance bulk campaign manager for broadcast dialing. This tool manages the concurrent uploading of massive listing files across multiple campaigns. It features built-in deduplication and compliance filtering, ensuring that large-scale outreach programs can be launched in minutes instead of hours, with a focus on reliability and system uptime.

facebook-comment-scraper.name: Facebook Post Comment Scraper
facebook-comment-scraper.description: Advanced concurrent scraper for Facebook post comments that handles processing and data saving with significantly higher efficiency than manual tasks.
facebook-comment-scraper.fullDescription: A powerful, high-concurrency engagement analysis tool. This scraper retrieves every comment from targeted Facebook posts, handling massive volumes of data through parallel processing. It automatically cleans and saves the data into structured formats, enabling deep sentiment analysis and community engagement tracking at a scale that is impossible to achieve manually.

hero.title: vendox-automation provides automation solutions and custom tools
hero.description: We craft efficient workflows where advanced technology meets precision

quote.text: Efficiency is doing things right; effectiveness is doing the right things.
quote.author: Peter Drucker

about.title: about-us
description: We are a team of automation specialists focused on streamlining web experiences and professional workflows. We develop responsive tools from scratch and transform them into efficient automated experiences.
Transforming complex tasks into simple, automated knowledge has been our passion. We help clients establish a robust digital presence through cutting-edge technologies and frameworks.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: We are interested in collaboration opportunities. If you have a specific request or question, donâ€™t hesitate to contact us.

projectdetails.description: Detailed project information and automation metrics

description: We are automation specialists providing high-end workflow solutions. We develop custom tools and raise them into modern user-friendly experiences.
Our focus is on delivering scalability and performance. We always strive to leverage the newest technologies to solve real-world problems.

facts.title: our-vibe
list: We prioritize clean and scalable code
We love solving complex automation puzzles
We focus on performance and uptime
